Job Position: Inventory Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikota, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Job Type: Onsite

Job Description


	The company is seeking to hire an Inventory Officer who is responsible for tracking stock levels, ensuring accurate inventory records, and supporting replenishment processes to prevent stockouts or overstocking across all hubs and retail locations.


Key Responsibilities


	Track inventory levels across warehouses and stores.
	Conduct regular stock counts, reconciliations, and variance reporting.
	Monitor goods-in and goods-out flows and ensure records match physical stock.
	Generate stock reports to support procurement decisions.
	Flag fast- and slow-moving items and recommend stock adjustments compliance tracking.
	Ensure accurate updates in inventory management software (IMS).
	Maintain stock ledgers, product SKUs, and barcoding.
	Monitor inventory shrinkage and investigate discrepancies.
	Support stock audits and enforce inventory control procedures.
	Ensure inventory processes align with internal policies and regulatory standards.
	Prepare documentation for goods received and issued.


Key Requirements


	Good First Degree in Accounting, Business Administration, or related field.
	2+ years of experience in inventory control or warehouse management.
	Knowledge of inventory management systems (ERP/IMS).
	Analytical mindset and attention to detail.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet tight timelines.
	Familiarity with retail/FMCG industry a plus.


Compensation
N120,000 monthly net + other benefits.

Method of Application
Interested Candidates who meet the above criteria should kindly send their CVs to:&nbsp;recruitment@dunnandbraxton.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Inventory Officer&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.",

Inventory Officer Job at Dunn And Braxton Limited




        
    

        
        Dunn And Braxton Limited - Our client is a dynamic and fast-growing company specializing in the wholesale distribution of premium tobacco accessories. With operational hubs in Lagos, Enugu, and Abuja, they are expanding aggressively across Nigeria and beyond.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer

Job Location: Ikota, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Job Type: Onsite

Job Description
     

            
    




	The company is seeking to hire an Inventory Officer who is responsible for tracking stock levels, ensuring accurate inventory records, and supporting replenishment processes to prevent stockouts or overstocking across all hubs and retail locations.


Key Responsibilities


	Track inventory levels across warehouses and stores.
	Conduct regular stock counts, reconciliations, and variance reporting.
	Monitor goods-in and goods-out flows and ensure records match physical stock.
	Generate stock reports to support procurement decisions.
	Flag fast- and slow-moving items and recommend stock adjustments compliance tracking.
	Ensure accurate updates in inventory management software (IMS).
	Maintain stock ledgers, product SKUs, and barcoding.
	Monitor inventory shrinkage and investigate discrepancies.
	Support stock audits and enforce inventory control procedures.
	Ensure inventory processes align with internal policies and regulatory standards.
	Prepare documentation for goods received and issued.


Key Requirements


	Good First Degree in Accounting, Business Administration, or related field.
	2+ years of experience in inventory control or warehouse management.
	Knowledge of inventory management systems (ERP/IMS).
	Analytical mindset and attention to detail.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet tight timelines.
	Familiarity with retail/FMCG industry a plus.


Compensation
N120,000 monthly net + other benefits.

Method of Application
Interested Candidates who meet the above criteria should kindly send their CVs to: recruitment@dunnandbraxton.com using “Inventory Officer” as the subject of the mail.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Aviation Insurance and Reinsurance Officer",
  "description": "Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Aviation Insurance and Reinsurance Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job summary


	We&#39;re hiring for a client in the insurance sector seeking a professional with hands-on experience in aviation insurance and facultative reinsurance placements.


Key Responsibilities


	Structure and place aviation insurance covers (Hull, Passenger Liability, Airport Liability, etc.)
	Handle facultative placements with local and international reinsurers
	Liaise with underwriters, reinsurers &amp; aviation clients
	Ensure compliance with NAICOM/NCRIB documentation
	Support claims handling and client relationship management


Requirements


	4&ndash;6 years of experience in insurance/reinsurance (min. 2 in aviation-related risks)
	Strong understanding of aviation policies and facultative slips
	CIIN certification required; ACII/CPCU is a plus
